Reference

Using weathercan

stations_search()

Search for stations by name or location

stations_dl()

Get available stations

weather_dl()

Download weather data from Environment Canada

weather_interp()

Interpolate and add weather data to a dataframe

weathercan-package

Easy downloading of weather data from Environment and Climate Change Canada

Utility functions

tz_calc()

DEFUNCT: Get timezone from lat/lon

get_tz()

DEFUNCT: Get timezone from lat/lon

Example Data

kamloops

Hourly weather data for Kamloops

kamloops_day

Daily weather data for Kamloops

pg

Hourly weather data for Prince George

finches

RFID Data on finch visits to feeders
